fields.summary: Android: Setting "color" to null on Label causes color to be transparent

comments.body:
Verified the fix with:

Appc-Studio:  3.2.0.201310100354
Sdk:3.2.0.v20131009134844
alloy:1.2.2
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.2.0
titanium-code-processor:1.0.3
Device:Google Nexus 7(v4.3),ipodTouch1(v7.0)
Xcode: 5


Setting "color" to null on Label remains by default as black solid color on both the platform iOS and Android.
